{{Description|A Dragontooth that has absorbed vitality and now exudes a warmth that-makes one uneasy. Once upon a time, a dragon fell to ruin in a silver valley, painting the bone-white snow an ominous crimson. This crimson symbolizes the might of this dragon. This Dragontooth wrapped in that crimson may yet be forged into a deadly weapon...}}
'''Vitalized Dragontooth''' is a quest item that is used in the World Quest [[The Festering Fang]].

Vitalized Dragontooth is also used to forge the [[Dragonspine Spear]] in [[Forging]] post-quest.
